rooms.description: An expansive area for welcoming guests that leads to the living room. Includes Vastu alignment by keeping a clear central focal point.
Adjacent to the living room for easy serving and dining. Maintains Vastu balance with seating facing east.
Designed for functional cooking space with Chettinad aesthetics using local stone and wood finishes. Implements Vastu by placing the stove in a north-east corner.
A spacious room for the primary occupants with natural light and Vastu-aligned bed placement. Includes built-in wardrobe and privacy features.
A comfortable guest room with Vastu alignment ensuring restful sleep. Positioned away from noisy areas.
A dedicated entertainment space designed for optimal acoustics and viewing experience. Includes soundproof walls and adjustable seating.
A personal fitness space designed with Vastu principles for energy flow. Equipped with modern gym equipment.
A two-car garage integrated into the ground floor design. Vastu-friendly placement ensures ease of access.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles to bring in positive energy.
Strategically placed windows for natural ventilation and lighting while maintaining privacy and aesthetic appeal.
Automated entry door with sufficient clearance for two cars, compliant with local building norms.
